jumbo.title: Retro gaming made easy
jumbo.player: Play all your retro games, add your roms, and the app handle everything: emulators configuration, controllers...
jumbo.manager: You have dozen of games? Install the manager, centralize everything and let it handle your whole collection for you.

content.title: Why Play50hz ?
content.card1.title: Easy to use, select your game, press a button and play!
content.card1.body: Nothing else than putting your rom in the right directory, and you're done, no additional configuration, just the fun to rediscover your old treasures.
content.card2.title: I want to play all my old games!!!
content.card2.body: Game console or arcade systems, anything can be played!
content.card2.body2: Currently, only the Nintendo NES, the Super Nintendo, the Sega Master System and Sega Megadrive are supported, many other will soon be added.
content.card3.title: I want to customize my system
content.card3.body: Everything is configurable, each element can be moved, resized, modified, create your own themes for each console, or even for each game.
content.card4.title: I want to easily manage my collection
content.card4.body: Play50hz also offers a manager to manage your collection of retro games, it is a dedicated application that allows you to centralize your collection and share it between your machines.
content.card4.body2: The manager is able to detect duplicates, whether roms, covers or videos, simply add them and it takes care of reconciling everything.
